sentence.Network_en: A bevy of bathing beauties appeared on the beach.
sentence.Network_cn: 沙滩上出现了一群游泳的美女.

sentence.Network_en: Bevy, I'm really curious as to this sudden decision of yours.
sentence.Network_cn: 白妃, 我对你这样突如其来的决定,的确感到奇怪.

sentence.Network_en: I was so driven , Bevy, I didn't know which way to turn.
sentence.Network_cn: 我真是迫不得已呀,白菲, 我不知道走哪条路好了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 托福考试词汇研究－Unit5 ... benevolence 仁爱；慈善 bevy n. 一群鸟；一群人 bias n.n. 斜线；成见，心里的倾向.
GRE单词分类总结之名词--人物篇-... ... 49. benefactor: 行善者，捐助者。 50. bevy: 一群少女。 51. bibliophile: 珍爱书籍者。.
陈琦GRE词汇-此心安处-搜狐博客 ... 鹅群 gaggle：goose 少女群 bevy 幼鸟群 brood.
archipelago 群岛bevy 一群鸟；一群少女、少妇；一堆东西；一群人colony 菌群.

list.abs: a bevy of reporters crowded toward the candidate .一群记者涌向候选人
a bevy of girls were picking tea on the hillside .一群姑娘正在山坡上采茶。

as she explains in an opening monologue , she a life most kids would envy : no school , a bevy of tame animal friends and a whole island to herself .她以独白开始介绍她自己，她的生活让大多数的孩子羡慕，不用上学，和一群性格温顺的小动物做朋友，整个岛屿都是她的。
a bevy of girls were picking tea on the hillside .一群姑娘正在山坡上采茶。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : of unknown origin

entry.def: A bevy of people is a group of people all together in one place.

example.tran: 一群充满朝气的年轻军官

means.word_mean: 1. a group of girls or young women
